lists.title: Asphalt Shingle Roof Replacement
lists.shortDescription: Popular, cost-effective residential roofing: architectural and 3-tab asphalt shingles with full tear-off and disposal.
lists.description:
• Service Includes: Full roof inspection, tear-off (if required), new underlayment, flashing, ventilation upgrades, shingle installation, cleanup, and disposal.

  • Benefits:

    • Wide range of color and style options (architectural & premium shingles)

    • Cost-effective lifetime value for most homes

    • Fast install times and proven weather resistance
lists.h2: What Is an Asphalt Shingle Roof Replacement in El Paso, TX
lists.p2: An asphalt shingle roof replacement removes old, failing shingles and installs a modern roofing system designed for the Southwest climate. We use high-quality architectural shingles, ice & water barriers at vulnerable areas, and proper attic ventilation to extend roof life. Meraz Roofing Inc provides a written estimate, manufacturer-backed materials, and a workmanship warranty. Call [phone] to schedule a no-obligation roof evaluation.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need Shingle Roof Replacement in El Paso, TX?
lists.overViewContent:
• Typical Signs You Need Replacement:

    • Missing or curled shingles

    • Repeated roof leaks or water stains

    • Granule loss in gutters or heavy weathering

What's Included:

  • Comprehensive roof inspection and written report

  • Full tear-off or overlay options, disposal, and roof deck repair

  • New underlayment, flashing, ridge vents, and starter course

Typical Project Timeline:
1–3 days for standard single-family homes (weather dependent)
Warranty: Manufacturer + workmanship options available

lists.h2: Flat Roof and TPO Roofing Services in El Paso, TX
